abstract: Yahoo’s directors get an endorsement from Institutional Shareholder Services ahead of their expected reelection at the company’s Aug. 1 annual meeting.
snippet: Yahoo’s directors get an endorsement from Institutional Shareholder Services ahead of their expected reelection at the company’s Aug. 1 annual meeting.
lead_paragraph: With the proxy fight between the billionaire investor Carl Icahn and Yahoo settled, there is little risk that Yahoo’s directors will face much more than some uncomfortable questions from shareholders at the company’s annual meeting on Aug. 1. Their re-election is virtually assured.
